Title: WPF Breakout
Description: Remake of the classic Breakout game using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Remake of the classic Breakout game using WPF.


Project Aims
This project is intended to be a learning source for beginner developers, myself included, wanting to learn WPF and some basic game programming.
I would like it to be a basic template for developing well organised and documented projects.


Help
I am Looking for guidance in the following areas:
*Code organisation and arrangement i.e setting up a basic project structure, class organisation etc.
*Manipulation of WPF Elements
*Building game loops
*Determining efficient collision detection algorithms
*Possible databinding of game sprites
